# LFEVolumeControl

**Enumeration Case**

The identifier for the low-frequency effect volume control class.

## Declaration

```swift
LFEVolumeControl
```

## Discussion

This class is a subclass of the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioLevelControl] class for an LFE channel that results from bass management. If you use normal audio channels to represent LFE channels, you must use the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioClassID/VolumeControl] class to manipulate the level.

## Level and Volume Control Objects

- **LevelControl**: The identifier for the audio level control class.
- **VolumeControl**: The identifier for the audio volume control class.
